description:
A incubadora 4Scale, um projecto do CEiiA em parceria com a COTEC e com a Startup Portugal, organiza todos os meses um encontro com o objectivo de aproximar startups e outras empresas. Este mês, em debate estará a Cibersegurança.
17h30 Welcome: CEiiA & COTEC
17h45 About 4Scale: Maria Miguel Ferreira, Head of Open Innovation @ CEiiA
18h00 Risks and opportunities in Cybersecurity for your business
- Corporate pitch: Jorge Pinto, Head of Cybersecurity @BPI
- Startup pitch: Carlos Gonçalves, Head of Sales & Marketing @Jscrambler
- Q&A facilitator: Paula Correia Morais, General Director @ANJE
18h30 How is Cyber Intelligence adding value to your business?
- Corporate pitch: Artur Monteiro, Security Lead @Accenture
- Startup pitch: Pedro Borges, CTO @Loqr
- Q&A facilitator: Alexandre Mendes, Executive Director @Startup Braga
19h00 Cocktail
name: Startups x Corporates: Friends with Benefits
